replies.bodyText:
Tricky. I guess we can only use absolute links between guides, as we have overview, quickstart etc in the path. The path could be split with more variables to represent {BookName}, {ProductVersion}, but we'd still need to make sure this was properly represented when branching. Not sure how that might translate to OperatorHub doc.
I suppose we could use relative links if we created one meta book upstream with all the other books sitting underneath.
The simplest option is for the guide-to- guide links to go. Shame to lose them though.
replies.author: PaulRMellor

replies.bodyText: For upstream, I think we can make it work with just using relative links ... e.g. using.html and deploying.html etc. We would need to do some changes to the website I guess, but it should be possible and it might work.
